modName: Lydia - Silence Dammit (No Yawn - No Cough - No Disrespect)
summary:
Lydia - Silence Dammit

Prevents Lydia from yawning in any situation, optionally also coughing and clearing her throat . Optional : respectful "All Right" when asked to carry your burdens.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#cc0000][size=4][b] * Lydia - Silence Dammit ! *
[/b][/size][/color][size=4]
[/size]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#c9daf8][u][b]Description[/b][/u][/color]

Fed up with Lydia always yawning at your back while you are carefully planning your attack or just chilling and mixing potions ?

Fed up hearing her clearing her troat and coughing to make her point on who knows what ?

This mod [size=3]prevents [/size]Lydia from [size=3][b]yawning[/b][/size], [size=3][b]coughing [/b][/size]and [size=3][b]clearing her throat[/b][/size] in any situation.

The main mod removes the 3 sound events.
[b]'No Yawn Only'[/b] versions only prevents Lydia from yawning, letting her cough and clear her throat.

[i]
[color=#cfe2f3]Addition [/color]:
Alternative mod "[color=#cfe2f3][b]Lydia - Silence Dammit Plus[/b][/color]"
[size=3][size=2]also [/size]replaces [/size]the annoying [size=3][b]"I'm sworn to carry your burdens..."[/b][/size] answer by a nice and quick [size=3]"All right"[/size]. ( Recommended ! )[/i]

Additional [b][color=#cfe2f3]Subtitles fix[/color][/b] provided with or without Hearthfire/Legendary support.


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#c9daf8][b][u] Compatibility[/u][/b][/color]

Compatible with anything : Skyrim Vanilla/SE, All DLCs, All Lydia/Companion overhauls.

[color=#cfe2f3]'Lydia - Silence Dammit' / 'Plus'[/color]Â  is a simple sound file replacer of Lydia's sounds of yawning, coughing and clearing her throat.
The original replaced sounds are kept safely in the original vanilla .bsa file, so using this mod won't do any harm to your install or savegames, and won't
do any harm if removed.

- '[i][color=#cfe2f3][b]Lydia - Silence Dammit Plus[/b][/color][/i] [color=#cfe2f3]with Fixed Subtitles[/color]' provides an .esp file that will work with any Skyrim setup. If you have [b]Hearthfire[/b] or Legendary Edition, use the specific Hearthfire/Legendary version of the mod.

- Recommended Load order for the optional .esp file :
After any Lydia altering mod. If you don't get the fixed subtitle, that just means that another mod takes it over. It won't change any NPC stats or whatsoever, it's clean and alters only and specifically the concerned trade dialogue record, so it's safe to load it last in any mod configuration.

If you have a NPC mod using some of Lydia's voice acting, she won't yawn, cough or clear her throat, but that's all. [i]

[b][color=#cfe2f3]*[/color][/b] Note : "[color=#cfe2f3]Lydia - Silence Dammit Plus[/color]" alternative mod will take over [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4806/?]Respectful Lydia - Willing Burden Carrier[/url] 's different sentence replacer, so just take the "[color=#cfe2f3]Lydia - Silence Dammit[/color]" main mod if you want to use both mods in a complementary way. (Find here RL-WBC fixed esps for Lydia mods compatibility)
[/i]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#cfe2f3][b][u] Installation[/u][/b][/color]

------------------------------------------------------------------

[u]Mod Organizer / Nexus Mod Manager[/u]

Just download and install/remove the mod as usual.
Any mod load order will work with the main files.
If you use an optional files including a subtitle fixing .esp, load the .esp after any Lydia mod.

------------------------------------------------------------------
[u]
Manual Install[/u]

Unzip the archive's content in your Data folder

(i.e. put the 'sound' folder in this location : ...\[Your-Skyrim-install-folder]\Data\ )

------------------------------------------------------------------

[u]Manual Uninstall[/u]

Go to this location : ...\[Your-Skyrim-install-folder]\Data\sound\voice\skyrim.esm\femaleeventoned\

Remove these 3 files :

- dialoguegeneric__0006aea8_1.fuz
- dialoguegeneric__0006aeaa_1.fuz
- dialoguegeneric__0006aeab_1.fuz

[i][b][color=#cfe2f3]*[/color][/b][/i] For "Lydia - Silence Dammit Plus" uninstallation, also remove this additional file :
- dialoguefo_dialoguefollowe_00060023_1.fuz

[i][b][color=#cfe2f3]*[/color][/b][/i] For the Fixed Subtitles versions,
Remove "Lydia - Silence Dammit Plus - xxxx .esp" from ...\[Your-Skyrim-install-folder]\Data\ folder

The vanilla sounds will be restored next time you start your game.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#cfe2f3][b][u] Permissions[/u][/b][/color]

Do whatever you want with this material without asking.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#cfe2f3][b][u] Credits[/u][/b][color=#ffffff]
